issue.title: [Rust] Implement ability to check if two schemas are the same
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4727](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4727). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When creating RecordBatch it would be desirable to ensure that all batches have the same schema and that the schema matches the schema defined for the RecordBatch. We currently have no way to compare two schemas to see if they are equivalent.
